channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Digital Editions
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Digital Editions

item.title: CVE-2020-3760|2024-08-04T07:44:50.558Z -- adobe -- adobe%20digital%20editions
item.description: Adobe Digital Editions versions 4.5.10 and below have a command injection vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-3798|2024-08-04T07:44:50.894Z -- adobe -- adobe%20digital%20editions
item.description: Adobe Digital Editions versions 4.5.11.187212 and below have a file enumeration (host or local network) vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-3759|2024-08-04T07:44:50.375Z -- adobe -- adobe%20digital%20editions
item.description: Adobe Digital Editions versions 4.5.10 and below have a buffer errors vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
